VanityCustomRole.Name: VanityCustomRole
VanityCustomRole.Info: An admin will contact you to discuss the role.
VanityCustomRole.Description: A custom role with a custom name and color just for you.

RolePermissions.Name: RolePermissions
RolePermissions.Info: An admin will contact you to discuss what permissions will be added.
RolePermissions.Description: Specific permissions that can be added to your vanity role. (You must already have a vanity role).

MuteUser.Name: MuteUser
MuteUser.Info: The specified user will be muted straight away
MuteUser.Description: Able to mute any user for 12 hours at a time (cannot send messages)
